caption.title: Epicast user interface.
caption.p: A screenshot of the Epicast user interface for predicting flu in the United States. On any given week, the wILI trajectory of the current season (solid black) is only partially observed. A userâ€™s prediction is a continuation of this trajectory over weeks in the future (dashed black). wILI trajectories of past seasons show the typical course of influenza epidemics (colored lines).
